article.title: Microwave Monolithics to Research Radio-Frequency Patch
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Microwave Monolithics Incorporated, Simi Valley, California, was awarded a more than $7 million cost-plus-fixed-fee contract for the research of a small combat identification patch called the Radio-Frequency Patch. The Defense Microelectronics Activity, McClellan, California, is the contracting activity.
